name: @webiny/handler-db
description: Webiny API plugin that provides a db driver for DynamoDB.
author: Webiny Ltd.

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist '*.tsbuildinfo' && babel src -d dist --source-maps --copy-files --extensions ".ts,.tsx" && yarn postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp package.json LICENSE README.md dist/ && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
